articles.title: Stranger Things & Diddy Doc Dominate Netflix In First Week Of December
articles.description: Stranger Things 5 was the most-streamed title of the week on Netflix, but Sean Combs: The Reckoning came in a close second
articles.content: Stranger Things was still dominating Netflix last week after a record-breaking opening over the Thanksgiving holiday. The first four episodes of Season 5, while down about 57% from its debut weekend, put up a massive 25.2M views from December 1 to 7,... [1721 chars]

articles.title: The Reckoning' Ratings on Netflix
articles.description: 'Stranger Things' Season 5 led the Netflix Top 10 in its second week, followed by Diddy docuseries 'Sean Combs: The Reckoning.'
articles.content: It’s “Stranger Things” season at Netflix. Last week, the first four episodes of the sci-fi show’s fifth and final season debuted with 59.6 million views in their first five days of streaming last week. Though viewership decreased to 23.6 million view... [1500 chars]

articles.title: ‘That Boy A Monster.’ Waka Flocka Flame Didn’t Mince Words After Watching New Diddy Docuseries
articles.description: Waka Flocka Flame got a chance to check out Sean Combs: The Reckoning, and he didn't hold back about how it's impacted his view of celebrities.
articles.content: Sean Combs: The Reckoning is proving to be one of the most discussed titles to hail from Netflix’s 2025 schedule. Produced by Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson, the four-part docuseries centers on Combs (a.k.a. Diddy) and his rise to music stardom as well as ... [2277 chars]

articles.title: Diddy's mum claps back at Netflix doc claims about 'abuse'
articles.description: Diddy's mum has spoken out about the new Netflix documentary about her son, Sean Combs: The Reckoning, slamming its 'falsehoods'
articles.content:
Diddy’s mum, Janice Combs, has spoken out after watching Netflix’s Sean Combs: The Reckoning, and suffice it to say she is not happy.
Diddy is also not pleased by his portrayal in the Netflix documentary, calling it “fundamentally unfair, and illegal... [3118 chars]

articles.title: Diddy's ex Misa Hylton speaks out 'cruel' Netflix claims he 'beat her'
articles.description: Ex girlfriend of Diddy, Misa Hylton, speaks about Netflix documentary Sean Combs: The Reckoning and accusations about relationship and son.
articles.content:
Misa Hylton, who is the ex-girlfriend of Diddy, has spoken about the wave of harassment she and her son have had since the release of Sean Combs: The Reckoning on Netflix.
Renowned stylist Misa Hylton dated Diddy in the early 1990s, and was his first... [2423 chars]

articles.title: 50 Cent Issues A Stern Warning For Marlon Wayans
articles.description: Marlon Wayans recently took issue with 50 Cent's new Netflix documentary about Diddy, "Sean Combs: The Reckoning."
articles.content: Wayans explained his issues with the project during an appearance on REAL 92.3 LA. "You can create any narrative as a producer and as a storyteller," he explained when asked about the documentary. "I can create any narrative... It doesn't mean it's t... [459 chars]

articles.title: Diddy claps back claim he sent 50 Cent creepy gift after Netflix doc
articles.description: Diddy team reply to claims he sent 50 Cent a gift from prison after release of Sean Combs: The Reckoning on Netflix.
articles.content:
Diddy has clapped back at the claim he sent 50 Cent a “creepy” gift from prison following the release of the Netflix documentary series about him.
Last week, Sean Combs: The Reckoning was released on Netflix, which is executively produced by 50 Cent,... [1531 chars]

articles.title: Top Shows To Stream Right Now Besides The Diddy Documentary
articles.description: "Sean Combs: The Reckoning" joins other trending shows this week, including Peacock's "Bel Air" and HBO Max's "Heated Rivalry."
articles.content:
“Sean Combs: The Reckoning” is the No. 1 show on Netflix right now, according to the streamer’s public ranking system.
The damning four-part docuseries — directed by Alexandria Stapleton and executive-produced by Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson — spans deca... [2684 chars]

articles.title: Diddy fears Sean Combs: The Reckoning is his 'permanent cancel card' as 50 Cent documentary exposes explosive revelations: 'Total cultural exile'
articles.description: 50 Cent’s Netflix docuseries Sean Combs: The Reckoning has Diddy under immense stress, exposing controversies and prompting his legal team to demand its removal. The series tops charts in 43 countries and may define his public legacy.
articles.content:
Shivani Negi | Dec 09, 2025, 19:52 IST
( Image credit : X/@PopFactions | Diddy calls Netflix docuseries his “cancel card” )
50 Cent’s Netflix docuseries Sean Combs: The Reckoning has Diddy under immense stress, exposing controversies and prompting hi... [3670 chars]

articles.title: 50 Cent calls out Stranger Things creators just as Sean Combs: The Reckoning tops Netflix charts in 43 countries: 'Can't f**k with me'
articles.description: After its December 3, 2025, premiere, Sean Combs: The Reckoning briefly topped Netflix's global charts, overtaking Stranger Things before the hit series quickly reclaimed #1, sparking fresh online buzz.
articles.content:
Karen Noronha | Indiatimes | Dec 09, 2025, 17:43 IST
( Image credit : Instagram/50cent & netflixjp | 50 Cent teases possible beef with Stranger Things’ Duffer Brothers as Diddy documentary climbs Netflix charts )
After its December 3, 2025, premiere,... [3072 chars]
